channel.title: I get this on some clients . .
channel.description:
Hey, ive had this a couple of times on Clients,
[code]Client Is loading...... ----------------------- Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Could not create the Java virtual machine. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
any solutions or is the actual client?
